SEARCH
Module com.example.cab302project
Package com.example.cab302project.model

Interface IJournalDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
MockJournalDAO
public interface IJournalDAO
The IJournalDAO interface defines the methods for managing journal entries.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addEntry(String entry, String mood, String userName)
    Adds a new journal entry.
    void
    deleteEntry(Journal journal)
    Deletes a journal entry.
    List<Journal>
    getAllEntries(String userName)
    Retrieves all journal entries for a specific username.
    Journal
    getEntry(int id)
    Retrieves a journal entry by its ID.
    List<Journal>
    searchEntries(String keyword)
    Searches for journal entries that match the given keyword.
    void
    updateEntry(Journal updatedJournal)
    Updates an existing journal entry.

  • Method Details

    • addEntry

      void addEntry(String entry, String mood, String userName)
      Adds a new journal entry.
      Parameters:
      entry - The text of the journal entry.
      mood - The mood associated with the journal entry.
      userName - The username of the person making the entry.

    • updateEntry

      void updateEntry(Journal updatedJournal)
      Updates an existing journal entry.
      Parameters:
      updatedJournal - The Journal object containing updated information.

    • deleteEntry

      void deleteEntry(Journal journal)
      Deletes a journal entry.
      Parameters:
      journal - The Journal object to be deleted.

    • getEntry

      Journal getEntry(int id)
      Retrieves a journal entry by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the journal entry.
      Returns:
      The Journal object if found, or null if not.

    • getAllEntries

      List<Journal> getAllEntries(String userName)
      Retrieves all journal entries for a specific username.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username for which to retrieve journal entries.
      Returns:
      A list of Journal objects.

    • searchEntries

      List<Journal> searchEntries(String keyword)
      Searches for journal entries that match the given keyword.
      Parameters:
      keyword - The keyword to search for in journal entries.
      Returns:
      A list of matching Journal objects.
